title: Tweets from mobile devices are more likely to be egocentric, research … (Goldsmiths, University of ...
text: ( Source : Goldsmiths, University of London ) Mobile devices have changed the way we interact with the world. It's now normal behavior to take selfies or live Tweet an event, but can a mobile device really be an extension of the self? A recent
